name: Finadvance
overview: Finadvance SA is a private equity and venture capital firm specializing in venture capital investments and leveraged buy-outs such as management buy-outs and management buy-ins in middle market and mature companies. It prefers to invest in all sectors including early stage telecommunications, information technologies, specialized distribution, industrial services, electronics, new materials, biotechnology, retailing, client services, agri-food industry, equipment materials, consumer services, and healthcare companies. The firm also prefers to carry out buy-out transactions of small and medium-sized businesses in all industries in France. It invests between $4.71 million and $18.86 million in companies with an enterprise value between $7.86 million and $62.86 million with sales between $15.71 million and $157.14 million. The firm usually holds its investments between three and seven years. It prefers to take a seat on the Board of Directors in its portfolio companies. Finadvance SA was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Aix en Provence, France with an additional office in Ile-de-France, France.
